description: Okay this is quite a surprise! The excellent Crypt of the NecroDancer just got a surprise addition with a Hatsune Miku DLC launch. I know plenty of you will be buying this right?
title: Crypt of the NecroDancer just got a Hatsune Miku DLC

description: Here's an upcoming mysterious thriller adventure that looks quite special, one for fans of classic adventure games and it's releasing in October.
title: Mysterious thriller adventure The Heirloom launches in October - looks quite special

description: Back in January we had some security issues revealed in both X.Org and Xwayland, and here we are with a few more and so there's new versions available for both.
title: More security issues in X.Org and Xwayland revealed and new releases live

description: Beat 'N' Path is a game that sees you combine together your creativity and logic to create machines to play music, it looks wonderful and there's now a demo available.
title: Musical logic puzzler Beat 'N' Path has a demo live now

description: That's all folks. EA anticheat has now been added into Battlefield V, so it's the end of being able to play it on Steam Deck and other Linux systems.
title: Battlefield V now broken on Steam Deck / Linux with EA anticheat live
